headline: The Cigna Group (CI): One of the Best Healthcare Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Best Healthcare Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Cigna Group (NYSE:CI) stands against other best healthcare stocks to invest in.
